00041   class HqlInterpreter : public ReferenceCount {
00042   public:
00044     struct Callback {
00045       FILE *output;             // default is NULL
00046       bool normal_mode;         // default true
00047       bool format_ts_in_usecs;  // default false
00048       // mutator stats
00049       uint64_t total_cells,
00050                total_keys_size,
00051                total_values_size,
00052                file_size;
00053 
00054       Callback(bool normal = true) : output(0), normal_mode(normal),
00055           format_ts_in_usecs(false), total_cells(0), total_keys_size(0),
00056           total_values_size(0), file_size(0) { }
00057       virtual ~Callback() { }
00058 
00060       virtual void on_parsed(Hql::ParserState &) { }
00061 
00065       virtual void on_return(const String &) { }
00066 
00068       virtual void on_scan(TableScanner &) { }
00069 
00071       virtual void on_update(size_t total) { }
00072 
00074       virtual void on_progress(size_t amount) { }
00075 
00079       virtual void
00080       on_finish(TableMutator *mutator = 0) {
00081         if (mutator) try {
00082           mutator->flush();
00083         }
00084         catch (Exception &e) {
00085           do {
00086             mutator->show_failed(e);
00087           } while (!mutator->retry());
00088         }
00089       }
00090     };
00091 
00093     struct SmallCallback : Callback {
00094       CellsBuilder &cells;
00095       std::vector<String> &retstrs;
00096 
00097       SmallCallback(CellsBuilder &builder, std::vector<String> &strs)
00098         : cells(builder), retstrs(strs) { }
00099 
00100       virtual void on_return(const String &ret) { retstrs.push_back(ret); }
00101       virtual void on_scan(TableScanner &scanner) { copy(scanner, cells); }
00102     };
00103 
00105     HqlInterpreter(Client *client);
00106 
00108     void execute(const String &str, Callback &);
00109 
00111     void
00112     execute(const String &str, CellsBuilder &output, std::vector<String> ret) {
00113       SmallCallback cb(output, ret);
00114       execute(str, cb);
00115     }
00116 
00118     void execute(const String &cmd) {
00119       CellsBuilder cb;
00120       std::vector<String> res;
00121       execute(cmd, cb, res);
00122     }
00123 
00124   private:
00125     Client *m_client;
00126     uint32_t m_mutator_flags;
00127 
00128   };
00129 
00130   typedef intrusive_ptr<HqlInterpreter> HqlInterpreterPtr;
